location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.2651 of 1856 from Henry Anderson, Secretary to the Government of Bombay, to the Acting Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is a covering letter, enclosing an extract of paragraph 6 of extract no.8 of 1856 (folio 16), dated 20 February 1856, from the Court of Directors. The extract relates to the Amaieer chief Humeed bin Mujdel, and praises the actions that naval commanders took against him at Kutiffe [Al-Qaṭīf], while conceding that the outcome of the assault was an insufficient penalty for his misdeeds.
